name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Video Health Services PTZ Camera Control

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension is meant to allow Hatch sites to enable camera pan-tilt-zoom control during WebRTC sessions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The purpose of this extension is allow the full use of PTZ (pan-tilt-zoom) cameras using the Hatch videoconferencing website.
